article: president barack obama declared friday that the country 's disparate efforts to `` deter , prevent , detect and defend '' against cyberattacks would now be run out of the white house , but he also promised that he would bar the federal government from regular monitoring of `` private sector networks '' and the internet traffic that has become the backbone of american communications .
abstract: obama lays out his strategy on cyberattacks
